title: An Ethics Watchdog Criticized Stacey Abrams. His Boss Retracted It.
description: A failed lawsuit over voting rights prompts a debate over multimillion-dollar legal fees and conflicts of interest.
dc:creator: Michael Powell

media:content.media:credit: Nicole Craine for The New York Times
media:content.media:description: Stacy Abrams founded Fair Fight to fight voter suppression and it filed suit, saying it would prove state officials and Mr. Kemp had trampled on votersâ€™ rights.
